content.raw: About the (3) point, I believe a reference to the world instead of a pointer might be another option. You don't have to worry about code deleting the world from the `Atmosphere` or `Wind` classes. We also have guarantees that the world is going to be always alive within `Wind` or `Atmosphere`.
content.html: About the (3) point, I believe a reference to the world instead of a pointer might be another option. You don't have to worry about code deleting the world from the Atmosphere or Wind classes. We also have guarantees that the world is going to be always alive within Wind or Atmosphere.
